Flag Format:
CIT{example_flag}
Crypto.name: Very Based

Crypto.description:
Find the flag.

MSw1F1QMWRw3BFUrNChACFYtPxE=

Flag Format:
CIT{example_flag}
Crypto.name: You Know the Flag

Forensics.description:
Our intern strikes again! We told him to create an invoice for one of our sponsors, but he redacted all of the sponsors information so we cannot tell who we are sending it to. Can you recover the sponsor's name for us?

Use underscores as spaces in the flag.
Forensics.name: Invoice
Beep Boop

Forensics.description:
We told the intern to hide the flag within this ZIP. Did he listen?

Download corresponding file [here](https://mega.nz/file/YKtXnRIZ#kTvK7b-zOVa5rbR0mf2-rgi04kRKccxGoPQprNDHgVE)

**WARNING:** Windows was being weird with the file so you may not be able to solve this on there. Also, it is NOT a ZIP bomb :) 

You will know when you found the flag.

Format: CIT{example_flag}

`MD5: cf8a1ce26c7981d561ea2d8d661ee208`
Forensics.name: Not a ZIP Bomb
Secret Square
Sniff Sniff

Misc.description: I somehow lost one of my flags, I'm sure it's around here somewhere. Can you please help me find it?
Misc.name: Lost Flag

Misc.description:
Successfully run [PonyOS](https://www.ponyos.org/) and make the pony say your team name. Reach out to **boom** in **Discord DMs** with a screenshot for the flag when done.

Bonus points if you reformat your drive with it and can show us!
Misc.name: PonyOS
What's that one movie

Misc.description:
I leave you with this ciphertext:

**43qazxd 567tfc 098uhbjkl**

Have fun!
Misc.name: The numbers Mason!

Misc.description:
Networking is so much fun!

Add someone else from another team on LinkedIn, converse with them about CTF@CIT in LinkedIn DMs, and then message proof to **boom** in **Discord DMs** for the flag!
Misc.name: Networking
Keep Trying

Misc.description:
In the realm where echoes of binary whisper,
Amidst the void where zeros and ones shimmer.
In cryptic dance, symbols intertwine,
A silent language, beyond the confines of time.

Within the matrix, where patterns unfurl,
Inscribed in digits, a cosmic swirl.
A symphony of codes, in spectral hues,
The unseen tapestry, where truth imbues.

Through labyrinthine corridors, we tread,
In search of meanings, in words unsaid.
A ciphered verse, in shadows cast,
In the alchemy of numbers, secrets amassed.

Each stroke of key, a quantum leap,
In the quantum dance, where dreams seep.
Encoded echoes, in pixelated trance,
A cosmic ballet, in the cosmic expanse.

Yet amidst this cryptic dance of light,
Lies a quest, in the depths of night.
A file named "flag.txt," a beacon bright,
Guiding_seekers_through_the_cryptic_flight.

In the labyrinth of codes, where shadows roam,
The flag awaits, in its hidden home.
Unlock_the_secrets, unravel the maze,
And_claim_the_prize, in the_cyberspace_haze.

So let us delve into the depths unknown,
In the search for the flag, where realms are shown.
For_in_the_cryptic_verse, we find our grace,
In the enigmatic embrace, of cyberspace.


Flag Format: CIT{flag_format}
Misc.name: Tables Tables Tables

Misc.description:
Greg is gatkeeping the flag from me, maybe you can convince him to give it to you.

http://167.71.105.82:5000/
Misc.name: Gaslighting
Data Blocks

OSINT.description:
Hi, my name is Amos. I'm a big fan of the University of New Haven Chargers, and I just learned about this new social media called X! Pretty dumb name. Find my handle for some points.

Flag format: CIT{@xxxxx}
OSINT.name: Stalking 101

OSINT.description:
When was this song leaked?

Flag format is: CIT{MM/DD/YYYY}
OSINT.name: Leaked

OSINT.description:
**Which individual had these items in their home office in July of 2016?**

Please use underscores for spaces to when submitting the flag

We'll give you 20 extra points if you send us the video link in discord lol

Flag format: CIT{first_last}
OSINT.name: HE IS HIM!

OSINT.description:
What is the name of road this photo was taken on?

Flag format is just the name of the road without road, street, etc
Example: Main St. would be "CIT{main}" (this is not the flag)
OSINT.name: I'm as cold as a wise man
I'm not typing all that bro
Pipeline welders be like

Pwn.description:
I was just reading about the Linux SystemV ABI, and realized that I forgot I have a dance with my favorite niche internet microcelebrity in 30 minutes!

can you teach me how to Texas two-step in time so I can show them I mean business?

by **nop.so**
Pwn.name: twostep

Pwn.description:
what if we went backwards..... really really fast....

by **nop.so**
Pwn.name: ezpz

Pwn.description:
we found a flash drive going through my late grandma's stuff. the only thing on it was this weird binary! sure hope there's nothing insecure about it :3

by **nop.so**
Pwn.name: really really old

Pwn.description:
reject modernity, return to monke

by **nop.so**
Pwn.name: ret2monke

Pwn.description:
I don't even know what to do anymore. I was Fortnite last night when I heard an steady dripping noise coming from my basement. Turns out, there's a leak in my faucet, and I spent all my money commissioning meowskulls fanart!

fix it, would you?

by **nop.so**
Pwn.name: leaky faucet

Steganography.description: So we just hired an intern for our CTF. He wanted to make some challenges, but we told him to just make us a flyer to keep him occupied. Surely he didn't put a flag in here or else he's getting fired. Let us know..
Steganography.name: Intern

Steganography.description:
Embrace the dark, let the beast within rise,
A journey of strength, beneath the moon's wise eyes.
In silence and shadow, your true self you'll find, a beast of steg, untamed and unconfined. - Sensei

Flag Format: CIT{example_flag}
Steganography.name: The Art of the Beast

Steganography.description: I LOVE PRIME SO MUCH META MOON IS SO GOOD ITS SO FULFILLING MMMMM TASTY!
Steganography.name: I LOVE PRIME!

Steganography.description:
What does Fortnite have to do with wav files? I dunno..

Use underscores as spaces in flag. Ex: CIT{a_phrase_with_spaces}
Steganography.name: Drop me a chug jug!

Web.description:
I can't see it. Can you?

Flag format: CIT{example_flag)
Web.name: I can't see it

Web.description:
So it seems like our intern got a little pissed off we bossed him around and he pwned our website and is now holding us for ransom. We didn't have the budget for backups so we're kind of screwed.

I remember one of our developers had a page he was using to test some backend stuff. Something about finding "bugs" in the cloud? Not really sure what he meant as clouds don't have bugs inside of them. Weird.

Check it out and see if you can recover anything that might let us back in!

Flag format: CIT{example_flag}
Web.name: Intern Retaliation Arc

Welcome!.description:
The flag format for all challenges is: **CIT{FLAG}**

If any challenges do not follow that format, we will specify that in the challenge description.

Try this flag here: **CIT{F1rst_Fl4g}**
Welcome!.name: Welcome to the first CTF@CIT

Welcome!.description:
Make sure you are in our Discord to stay updated!

https://discord.gg/F76hFHCC8M

We'll be posting competition updates here. If any participants have any questions regarding the competition, you can ask staff in Discord too.

Find the flag to this challenge somewhere in our Discord :)
Welcome!.name: Discord
